item.description:
If you are open minded and business minded, I will invite you to meet and learn from my personal mentor who has made millions in the industry that Warren Buffet is saying is the next greatest shift of wealth.

 

There are only a few seats left for this event. If you wish to come and learn and meet him and myself, call me for more details.

 

Maryellen 603-490-4371

group.name: The Boston Millionaire Total Empowerment Meetup Group

item.name: Meet & Learn how my mentor has made MILLIONS on the next greatest shift of wealt
